title: Ella and Olivia
desc: Ella and Olivia are sisters. Ella is seven years old. Olivia is five-and-a-half years old. They live with their mum and dad and little brother Max. Ella and Olivia know the best thing about being sisters is that youll have a best friend forever! Read all about their adventures in this third collection of stories: Sports Carnival, Flower Power, Beach Holiday and Spelling Superstar.
